name: Sundance Airport, LLC
about: Sundance Airport, LLC, home to Sundance Flight Academy, is a premier aviation facility in Oklahoma City. As the largest privately owned/public use jetport in Oklahoma, Sundance Airport offers a comprehensive flight training program. Our academy provides FAA Part 61 training, including Private Pilot and Instrument Rating courses, with flexible scheduling to fit busy agendas. Students benefit from hands-on introductory flights and integrated training methods that put them at the controls from day one. With competitive pricing, modern aircraft, and a Redbird simulator, we ensure a high-quality learning experience. Our certified flight instructors are dedicated to safety and excellence, and our facilities include a pilot's lounge, ground school services, and aircraft rental options. Join us to embark on an exciting journey in aviation and become a licensed pilot with confidence and skill.
